loan_amount.clause_text: The Borrower agrees to borrow from the Bank and Bank agrees to lend to the Borrower a sum as mentioned in   the Schedule to this Agreement.
loan_amount.note: Loan amount is referenced as being defined in the Schedule; however, the Schedule field 'Loan / Facility amount'   is blank in this document.

evidence.clause_text: Interest chargeable (In case of Floating Rate Loans): MCLR* _____% + Margin _____% = _____%; Interest chargeable (In case of Fixed Rate Loans) â€” Schedule
evidence.note: Interest rate is defined by formula in the Schedule, but the actual percentage values are blank in this document.
